name: Five Nights at F***ing Candy's
description:
This is a reupload of the game for the sake of archival purposes. I did not make this.

Five Nights at F***cat's is a FNaF, FNaC and FNaFB fangame created in RPG Maker VX Ace.  In this game you play as Candy the Cat who wants to go on a hardcore night of debauchery, but in order to do so he must s**t on all the cameras.

This game features:

- Cameras!

- The cast of Five Nights at Candy's 1 (excluding Rat and Penguin) as playable characters!

- Fully voice acted dialogue (by text-to-speech)!

- Cameras!

- Broken English!

and more... cameras!

You will need RPG Maker RTP to play this game.

(It's free)
